alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:35AM EST until January 13 at 9:24PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .Recent rainfall and snow melt has caused the Green River at Paradise to once again rise back into Minor Flood stage. The precipitation and elevated water levels along the Green River upstream will keep water levels elevated through the middle of this week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 379.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 383.3 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM CST.
